post.body: umm.. did u try just restarting the laptop and clearing the broweser cash, and you're welcome BTW, also try disabling addons
how much RAM are you on? you shouldn't run VISTA on less than 2GB, also make sure u have the latest firefox version
So good! So good! I got YOU..
I nominate @joeschmitt for a Shorty Award in #humor because he asked me politely.. AH AH HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!
"Freedom of Expression" HELL YEAH!! hahahahahaha... freedom of expression bites!!
hey, syrian newpaper.. check the top of the top of the front page http://www.alwatan.sy/pdf/
"Creepy is the new Cute"
Patience my friend.. is promoted as a virtue by lazy people as an excuse for their incompetence. and its ok to say FUCKIN.. i guess
can you please send me the link to download "manger is my middle name" christmas album?
I blame the wine ;)
The Twitter Happiness score for me is: 494. http://happytweets.com it appears ur a happier person good for you!!
hahahaha, that's hilarious... oh sorry i mean "mean".. MERRY CHRISTMAS!!
I'm good at rhyming, I suck at poetry
we start writing news on shoes? That's a good idea it even rhymes :P
Must... fight... urge.. to say stupid shit..
"A shoe is worth a thousand Tomahawks." Anas Qtiesh
"Officials at the TV station, al-Baghdadiya, called for the release of their journalist, saying he was exercising freedom of expression."
trying twitter gadget http://twittergadget.com/ has good features but still feels strange ☻☹☹
Iraqi Journalist throws shoes at Bush, they were size 10. If only they were size 13.. still looking
I will NOT spend $140 on a pair of shoes! even if they were the only ones that fit
I'm the "best stalker ever!"...
250 unread items in G Reader... GRRRRRR! will never go 3 days unplugged again. SHIFT+A is not an option
On a bus home after 3 hectic days back packing around syria, intelligence agents tailing us were icing on the cake
